name: laravel/laravel
description: The skeleton application for the Laravel framework.

queue:work: npx concurrently -c "#fdba74,#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#bbf7d0" "php artisan queue:work database --sleep=1 --timeout=120 --tries=3" "php artisan queue:work database --sleep=1 --timeout=120 --tries=3" "php artisan queue:work database --sleep=1 --timeout=120 --tries=3" "php artisan queue:work database --sleep=1 --timeout=120 --tries=3" --names='worker1,worker2,worker3,worker4'
seed:fresh: npx concurrently -c "#fdba74,#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#bbf7d0" "php artisan queue:work database --sleep=1 --timeout=120 --tries=3 --verbose" "php artisan queue:work database --sleep=1 --timeout=120 --tries=3 --verbose" "php artisan queue:work database --sleep=1 --timeout=120 --tries=3 --verbose" "php artisan queue:work database --sleep=1 --timeout=120 --tries=3 --verbose" "tail -f storage/logs/laravel.log" --names='worker1,worker2,worker3,worker4,log'
dev: npx concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#fdba74,#bbf7d0,#f87171" "php artisan serve" "php artisan queue:listen --tries=1" "php artisan queue:work database --sleep=1 --timeout=120 --tries=3" "php artisan queue:work database --sleep=1 --timeout=120 --tries=3" "npm run dev" --names='server,listen,worker1,worker2,vite'
prod: npx concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#fdba74,#bbf7d0" "npm run build" "php artisan serve --env=production" "php artisan queue:work database --sleep=1 --timeout=120 --tries=3" "php artisan queue:work database --sleep=1 --timeout=120 --tries=3" --names='build,server,worker1,worker2'
